snippet.title: [Tricky Tracks 👣] - Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegame  #hideandseek #trailer 
Tricky Tracks is a fun and exciting multiplayer hide & seek game with a twist: As a RUNNER, you leave footprints! Handle them cleverly and confuse your chasers while you're running and hiding. Or as a SEEKER: Don't let them fool you! Hunt down the opposing team with tactical advantage at your hands. 

Play & Wishlist now! Every wishlist entry supports us ❤️
► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2122000/Tricky_Tracks__Early_Access/

Join us on Discord and help us develop the game further: 
► https://discord.gg/uFc7hYufng

Follow us here to stay tuned and play the alpha: 
► Website: https://playtrickytracks.com/
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tricky_Tracks
► Trello: https://trello.com/b/uaChruEq/trickytracks

Follow the development live on Twitch:
► Rain: https://www.twitch.tv/rain_crafts
► Jan: https://www.twitch.tv/lightyarn
